name: CloudFlare
description:
Extend your network globally by caching and securing your customers's websites at 32 points of presence around the world. Benefit from safer and happier customers, reduced bandwidth costs - all starting at FREE.

Not yet a partner? Sign up here.
author: CloudFlare

hostkey.Description: Required for the addon to perform any action. Not yet a partner? Sign up here

showclientlogs.Description: Control whether your clients can see the logs for actions they perform in the module. Full logs always available from the admin view.

adminid.Description: Admin user for internal calls. New user can be easily provisioned through the Add-On -> CloudFlare interface.

displayfrontendlink.Description: Additional information available here. Controls whether blue 'Setup CloudFlare' link is added to client side pages.

displayorderconfirmpage.FriendlyName: Display Instructions on Order Confirmation Page
displayorderconfirmpage.Description: CloudFlare by default makes the setup instructions available on the order confirmation page. Disable this to limit that information to the 'Setup CloudFlare' page
